instruction: Keep up with current routine and watch salt intake.

attributes.comment: Keep up with current routine and watch salt intake.

instruction: Patient reports no stomach pain with celecoxib unlike with ibuprofen. Blood pressure has been stable at home, usually around 120/80. Patient tries to stay active but finds it tough due to arthritis, engages in light walking and stretching.

attributes.narrative: Patient reports no stomach pain with celecoxib unlike with ibuprofen. Blood pressure has been stable at home, usually around 120/80. Patient tries to stay active but finds it tough due to arthritis, engages in light walking and stretching.
